item.title: EP 595 - The Cursed Crimson Fog Of Kirtland, Ohio
item.itunes:title: The Cursed Crimson Fog Of Kirtland, Ohio
item.description:
Today we play Bloody Mary with samurais, and then we investigate the cult of Kirtland, Ohio!
